data.title: The weather in March in Yekaterinburg
data.meta_description: The average weather for the month of March in Yekaterinburg. Read about the average temperatures and rainfall in Yekaterinburg for March.
data.text:
Normal weather for Yekaterinburg in March

It's cold in March in Yekaterinburg with an average temperature of 0°C. Temperatures this month range from a low of -6°C to a high of 4°C. At night, you can expect temperatures between -17°C and -3°C.

In March, there is an average of 39 mm of precipitation, spread over 7 days days. Of the total precipitation, about 45 cm falls as snow in March. The wind speed is around 4 Bft, mostly coming from the Southwest.

The UV index is a maximum of 5 this month. That's a moderate value on the intensity scale of 1 to 11. Unprotected skin can burn in about 30 minutes.

The highest recorded temperature on March in recent years was 18°C in 2023. The lowest daytime temperature on this day was -13°C in 2022. The extreme night temperatures ranged from a low of -33°C to a high of 6°C.

Average daily weather in March

Click on a day for more details about the average weather on that day in March.

Daily Temperature in March in Yekaterinburg

This chart shows the average daily high temperatures in March in Yekaterinburg, measured in degrees Celsius. The bottom of the chart shows the days of March. Based on historical data, it shows the average daily temperatures for this month.

Daily Rainfall in March in Yekaterinburg

This chart shows the average daily rainfall in March for Yekaterinburg, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail. The bottom of the chart shows the days of March. Based on historical data, this chart gives an idea of how much rain you can expect each day.

Daily Snowfall in March in Yekaterinburg

This chart shows the average daily snowfall in March in Yekaterinburg, measured in centimetres. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. The data is based on historical measurements and gives an idea of the average snowfall in March.

Daily UV Index in March in Yekaterinburg

This chart shows the average daily UV index in March in Yekaterinburg, with the UV index ranging from 0 to a maximum of 11. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. Based on historical data, this chart provides an idea of the daily UV radiation levels you can expect.

Temperature in March in Yekaterinburg Over the Years

This chart shows the average temperature in March in Yekaterinburg, measured in degrees Celsius, over the past years.

Total Rainfall in March in Yekaterinburg Over the Years

This chart shows the average rainfall in March in Yekaterinburg, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail.

Snowfall in March in Yekaterinburg per year

This chart shows the average snowfall in March in Yekaterinburg, measured in centimetres, over the past years.
